parameters.name: BeginTime
parameters.description: The start of the time range to query blocked emails.

parameters.name: BlockType
parameters.description:
The type of block.

- UNSUB: Unsubscribe

- REPORT: Spam report

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query blocked emails.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return.
Valid values: 1 to 500.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token used to start the query. If you do not specify this parameter, the query starts from the beginning of the results.
